Module Contents

.. py:class:: ApplicationCommunicator(application, scope)

   Runs an ASGI application in a test mode, allowing sending of
   messages to it and retrieval of messages it sends.


   .. py:attribute:: application


   .. py:attribute:: scope


   .. py:attribute:: input_queue


   .. py:attribute:: output_queue


   .. py:attribute:: future


   .. py:method:: wait(timeout=1)
      :async:


      Waits for the application to stop itself and returns any exceptions.



   .. py:method:: stop(exceptions=True)


   .. py:method:: send_input(message)
      :async:


      Sends a single message to the application



   .. py:method:: receive_output(timeout=1)
      :async:


      Receives a single message from the application, with optional timeout.



   .. py:method:: receive_nothing(timeout=0.1, interval=0.01)
      :async:


      Checks that there is no message to receive in the given time.
